---
title: "Today I Learned Something"
subtitle: "all the TILs that's fit to print."
listing:
  - id: til-table
    contents:
    - "tils/*.qmd"
    - "notes/*.qmd"
    sort: 
      - "title"
    type: table
    fields: [title, categories]
    #field-display-names:
    #  file-modified: "Updated"
    categories: true
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    date-format: "D MMM YYYY"
    page-size: 99
toc: false
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
execute: 
  warning: false
  message: false
  #echo: false 
search: false
---

Two kinds of post in here that might get separated out at some point

- TILs are short posts documenting some specific technique or solution to a problem
- Notes are a bit longer and more exploratory
